Sql.query: select canalcodi, -1 as ptomedicodi, medifecha, h2, h4, h6, h8, h10, h12, h14, h16, h18, h20, h22, h24, h26, h28, h30, h32, h34, h36, h38, h40, h42, h44, h46, h48, h50, h52, h54, h56, h58, h60, h62, h64, h66, h68, h70, h72, h74, h76, h78, h80, h82, h84, h86, h88, h90, h92, h94, h96 from me_scada where canalcodi in ({0}) and medifecha >= to_date('{1}','yyyy-mm-dd') and medifecha <= to_date('{2}','yyyy-mm-dd')

select -1 as canalcodi, ptomedicodi, medifecha, h1 as h2, h2 as h4, h3 as h6, h4 as h8, h5 as h10, h6 as h12, h7 as h14, h8 as h16, h9 as h18, h10 as h20, h11 as h22, h12 as h24, h13 as h26, h14 as h28, h15 as h30, h16 as h32, h17 as h34, h18 as h36, h19 as h38, h20 as h40, h21 as h42, h22 as h44, h23 as h46, h24 as h48, h25 as h50, h26 as h52, h27 as h54, h28 as h56, h29 as h58, h30 as h60, h31 as h62, h32 as h64, h33 as h66, h34 as h68, h35 as h70, h36 as h72, h37 as h74, h38 as h76, h39 as h78, h40 as h80, h41 as h82, h42 as h84, h43 as h86, h44 as h88, h45 as h90, h46 as h92, h47 as h94, h48 as h96 from me_medicion48 where lectcodi = {3} and tipoinfocodi = {4} and ptomedicodi in ({0}) and medifecha >= to_date('{1}','yyyy-mm-dd') and medifecha <= to_date('{2}','yyyy-mm-dd')

insert into wb_perfilscada ( perfcodi, perfdesc, fecregistro, fecinicio, fecfin, lastuser, lastdate, ejrucodi, perfclasi, perforig ) values( :perfcodi, :perfdesc, :fecregistro, :fecinicio, :fecfin, :lastuser, :lastdate, :ejrucodi, :perfclasi, :perforig )
select nvl(max(perfcodi), 0) + 1 as codigo from wb_perfilscada
select nvl(max(perfdetcodi), 0) + 1 as codigo from wb_perfildetalle
select * from ( select a.* from wb_perfilscada a where a.ejrucodi = :ejrucodi and a.perfclasi = :perfclasi order by a.fecregistro desc) where rownum = 1

select a.perfcodi, a.perfdesc, a.fecregistro, a.fecinicio, a.fecfin, a.lastuser, a.lastdate, a.ejrucodi, b.prrudetalle as prrunomb, b.prruabrev, a.perfclasi, a.perforig from wb_perfilscada a inner join me_perfil_rule b on a.ejrucodi = b.prrucodi where a.perfcodi = :perfcodi

select a.perfcodi, a.perfdesc, a.fecregistro, a.fecinicio, a.fecfin, a.lastuser, a.lastdate, a.ejrucodi, b.prrudetalle as prrunomb, b.prruabrev, a.perfclasi, a.perforig from wb_perfilscada a inner join me_perfil_rule b on a.ejrucodi = b.prrucodi where a.lastuser = '{0}' and a.perforig ='{3}' and a.fecregistro >= to_date('{1}','yyyy-mm-dd') and a.fecregistro <= to_date('{2}','yyyy-mm-dd') order by a.perfcodi desc

select pr.prrucodi as ejrucodi, pr.prruabrev, pr.prrudetalle as prrunomb, ps.perfdesc, ps.fecregistro, ps.fecinicio, ps.fecfin, ps.lastdate, pr.prrulastuser as lastuser, ps.perfcodi, ps.perfclasi, ps.perforig from me_perfil_rule pr left join wb_perfilscada ps on pr.prrucodi = ps.ejrucodi and ps.perforig = '{2}' and ps.lastuser = '{0}' inner join me_perfil_rule_area pa on pr.prrucodi = pa.prrucodi where pa.areacode = {1} and pr.prruind = '{2}' and pr.prruactiva = 'S' order by ps.fecregistro desc
